userreviews.userReview: Two things I loved about this: reference to the Walking Dead tv show and to Big Bang Theory. Also, nice removed perspective- not involved directly in all of the action from the prior books.
A novella with a character from Wallen's I Zombie series. Zombie Radio has good music, love, and zombies. What more could a reader ask for?

This book is a part of the I Zombie I univers masterfull created by the voice of the dj himself, Jack Wallen.First and before everything else, i just want to assure you that you will love and enjoy this novel even if you did not read anny other of the books from the I Zombie I series, only, a litle warning, this will gett you hoocked, cravyng for more, like a Zombie craves for brain. Yes, it is a novel about Zombies, if you want me to place it in the timeline of the I Zombie I world, it takes places at the same time like the second book of the series My Zombie My. The novel Zombie Radio descrives the begging of the broadcast with the same name, but, before i give away some spoilers i want to say that it is just a book about hope, about sticking to your humanity , no mather what. You can always choose if you want to consider the Zombies, especially Jack Zombies a metaphor for the comercial ever consuming and never full world that we are part of , or if you just want to take the story ad litteram and see them as dark, brainless hungry Monsters. Our nameles DJ is the voice that comes to you via pirate waves, the one that is there when all your dark litle voices are screaming that you should give up, he is the force that will pick you up and fill you with the best drug, hope! paralel to the world going down the drain our dj lives a litle bitt of a love Story of his own, with the gorgeous Alexa, whe dont know exactly who she is, is she what she prettends to be, is she just the incarnation of his need to have somebody to keep him hoping, hell, i am not even sure that she is real and our dj had not suffered a psichotic episode afther the shock of the apocalypse. There are so manny questions, so litle ansewrs. This book will introduce you to the coolest heroin ever, Bethany Nitschimi and the Zero day colective. Curious ?Grab this awesome piece of literature and you will find yourself glued to your device for at least 2 hours of delightful reading, and your hopefully still functional brain bussy with questions for a few more days. Because, is it not this what separates us from the Zombies, the power to ask a question, to wonder, to love, to enjoy a great song and last, but not least, like in Pandoras box there will be always be some pure hope, cuddled somewhere in the deps of your conscious being

Zombie Radio was a fun and quick read. Told through the eyes of your DJ of "WZMB, Zombie Radio.Your personal soundtrack to the end of the world."Here you find how music, is the universal language even in the last days.How it brings people together, to support each other and help to survive .How commiseration and sharing information can unite the last of human kind even with just a voice on the airway.You find out more about the ZDC (The Zero Day Collective) and what Vision they and one of their members Dr. Lindsay Godwin meant for "The Great Cleansing"to accomplish.DJ ,is intelligent and a tad sarcastic when he needs to be.He is a funny ,quick thinking and the catalyst to promote hope and a sense of community among the survivors.Tune in to find out more.As in other books in the I Zombie I series you also meet Bethany Nitishimi as well as others. I urge you to read the whole series. This is also a stand alone book, in the sense that you don't miss anything that is going on if you have not yet read any of the other books. So go pick up your copy today. Well done Jack Wallen.

description: Get your apocalypse on through the eyes and mouth of the DJ spinning your personal soundtrack to the end of the world. The novella inspired by the Zombie Radio podcast has finally arrived.This novella and the Zombie Radio podcast were based on the smash hit My Zombie My. Don't miss out on how Zombie Radio helped to save the planet from spiraling into the zombie abyss.
title: Zombie Radio
